current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Small Business Act to direct the task force of the Office of Veterans Business
			 Development to provide access to and manage the distribution of overseas
			 excess or
			 surplus property to veteran-owned small businesses.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Veterans Small Business Enhancement Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Veterans Small Business Enhancement Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 32(c)(3)(B) of the Small Business Act

header.#text: Access to overseas excess or surplus property for veteran-owned small businesses

text.#text: in clause (vi), by striking the period at the end and inserting
by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 549 of title
			 40, United States Code

text.#text:
providing access to and managing the distribution of excess or surplus property located outside the
			 United States that is owned by the United
			 States to small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans,
			 pursuant to a memorandum of understanding between the task force and the
			 head of the applicable state agency (as defined in

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2794 IS: Veterans Small Business Enhancement Act of 2014
